report.title: Bowl
report.author: User0000
report.bodytext: Has a pot-like taste, and while harsh on the lungs, gave a pretty immediate sedative feeling, of relaxation. It is like the tea, which I usually drink strong, 2 bags, but stronger - or like a weak or low dose of pot. Definitely feel cool, and have the pleasant aftertaste I've been missing. /n /n Smoked 1/2 the material from one of my tea bags.
